author: geoff
msg: add need() and need_* variant functions (need_module(), need_apache(),
etc) for use specifically with plan() to decide whether or not a test
should run.  have_* variants (have_module(), have_apache(), etc) are
now specifically for use outside of plan(), although they can continue
to be used within plan() without fear of current tests breaking.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * modules/experimental/mod_disk_cache.c (open_entity): Allow the data file to
be sent via sendfile() and allow the header file to be buffered.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * modules/experimental/mod_cache.c: Rename CACHE_IN to CACHE_SAVE.  Our
standard in-tree convention is _IN is for input filters.  That's not what
this filter did, so that caused confusion.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: header file descriptor is available.  (fd is an unnecessary check here.)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * modules/experimental/mod_cache.c: Delay no-store check until saving.
(It's a corner case with little benefit in the mainline.)
(Some nearby style nits also resolved in this patch.)
